report.name: eDPCOPIClient

reportHtmlEscapes.beforeReportHtmlEscape: <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN"> <html dir=&Direction> <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=&Encoding"> </head> <body bgcolor="#ffffff">

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
SELECT
tcs.ANNEE ANNEE, tcs.CLISIGLE CLISIGLE, tcs.DP_COPI DP_COPI, tcs.LIB_DP_COPI LIBELLE, sum(nvl(round(tcs.JH_ARBDECIDES),0)) JH_ARBDECIDES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.EU_ARBDECIDES),0)) EU_ARBDECIDES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.JH_CANTDECIDES),0)) JH_CANTDECIDES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.EU_CANTDECIDES),0)) EU_CANTDECIDES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.JH_REALISES),0)) JH_REALISES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.EU_REALISES),0)) EU_REALISES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.JH_EXTRAPOLES),0)) JH_EXTRAPOLES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.EU_EXTRAPOLES),0)) EU_EXTRAPOLES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.JH_REESTIMES),0)) JH_REESTIMES, sum(nvl(round(tcs.EU_REESTIMES),0)) EU_REESTIMES
FROM TMP_COPI_SYNTHESE_ETATS tcs where tcs.numseq = :p_numseq group by tcs.annee, tcs.CLISIGLE , tcs.DP_COPI , tcs.LIB_DP_COPI

dataItem.name: ANNEE
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Annee

dataItem.name: CLISIGLE
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Clisig

dataItem.name: DP_COPI
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Dp Cop

dataItem.name: LIBELLE
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Libell

dataItem.name: JH_ARBDECIDES
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Jh Arb

dataItem.name: EU_ARBDECIDES
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Eu Arb

dataItem.name: JH_CANTDECIDES
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Jh Can

dataItem.name: EU_CANTDECIDES
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Eu Can

dataItem.name: JH_REALISES
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Jh Rea

dataItem.name: EU_REALISES
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Eu Rea

dataItem.name: JH_EXTRAPOLES
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Jh Ext

dataItem.name: EU_EXTRAPOLES
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Eu Ext

dataItem.name: JH_REESTIMES
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Jh Ree

dataItem.name: EU_REESTIMES
dataItem.defaultLabel: Decode P Param8 Pdf Tps Eu Ree

dataSource.name: Q_2
dataSource.select: select cmensuelle from calendrier where add_months(trunc(sysdate,'MM'),-1) = calanmois

function.name: afterpform
r_g_codbrformattrigger
cf_real_arbformula
cf_real_arb_cantformula
cf_sumreal_sumarbformula
cf_sumreal_sumarb_sumcantformu
afterreport
